sources.title: Hanawa Hekonai Meito No Maki
sources.description: Namakura Gatana, meaning “dull-edged sword,” is a four-minute comedy about a samurai who, thanks to his dull instrument, loses every time he attacks a weak opponent. In order to examine the sword, he tries to attack passers-by, but lower-class townspeople fight back and knock him down. Watch on RetroFlix.org:  https://retroflix.org/hanawa-hekonai-meito-no-maki-1917/
